Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L820 Camera (Blue)
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  I am very happy with the Nikon Coolpix L820 camera.I wanted blue and it is a beautiful shade of blue.  Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP Back Side Illuminated CMOS Sensor
4.0-120mm f/3.0-5.8 NIKKOR Zoom Lens
22.5-675mm 35mm Equivalent Focal Length
30x Optical Zoom and up to 4x Digital
3" LCD Display with 921k-dot Resolution
Full HD 1080p Video with Stereo Sound
Optical VR Image Stabilization System
Support for Eye-Fi Memory Cards
EXPEED C2 Image Processing Engine
Uses Readily Available R6/AA Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (International Model) (Blue)
